name: WARZOOM
description:
Warzoom A game of dynamic strategy is a fantastic game with a process of elimination that truly anybody can play. Its a game of 70% Strategy amd 30% luck. Its made for the average Joe. This all new version of Warzoom A Game Of Dynamic Strategy now comes with new graphics, new sound and new special effects.

Warzoom offers gamers non-stop action from the beginning to the end! It's a game of tit-for-tat, back and forth, a battle where no two games are ever alike. Its an exciting game that comes with a glorious win. And if you cannot find the in-zone, don't give up, learn Warzoom! Prepare for events.
